title: Texass Governor, Perfecting Toilets, NFL Vaccinations, The Sage of South Central and more.
itunes:title: Texass Governor, Perfecting Toilets, NFL Vaccinations, The Sage of South Central and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve is very confident in ONE thing this morning. Treasure from Maryland has the perfect question for The Chief Love Officer. The word "play" definitely is a big part Drizzy going to the NFL. Chi-town really needs change straight up! Steve answers a specific question and he is just very mean with his answer. Vaccination is top of the mind for the NFL. Imagine the best #2 experience EVER! Big Dog has some things to say about The Sage of South Central. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve has a very important message about voting.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
